title: Composition Metadata
description: Metadata object used for additional information about a Microtonalist app composition file.

altName.description: Alternative name that typically includes Opus number, if any.

composerName.description: Name of the composer. You may omit the property if the composer is anonymous or unknown.

composerSortName.title: Composer Sort Name
composerSortName.description: The sort name of the composer which should start with the word used for sorting. Separate the part of the name that should be used for sorting with the other part that provides more details by using a comma and a space, ", ". For a person this would typically be "<Last Name, <First Name>", e.g. for composerName "John Doe", the composerSortName is "Doe, John".

arrangerName.description: Name of the arranger, if any.

arrangerSortName.title: Arranger Sort Name
arrangerSortName.description: The sort name of the arranger of the composition which should start with the word used for sorting. Separate the part of the name that should be used for sorting with the other part that provides more details by using a comma and a space, ", ". For a person this would typically be "<Last Name, <First Name>", e.g. for arrangerName "John Doe", the arrangerSortName is "Doe, John".

authorName.description: The person or organization who created the Microtonalist app tuning file.

authorSortName.title: Author Sort Name
authorSortName.description: The sort name of the author which should start with the word used for sorting. Separate the part of the name that should be used for sorting with the other part that provides more details by using a comma and a space, ", ". For a person this would typically be "<Last Name, <First Name>", e.g. for authorName "John Doe", the authorSortName is "Doe, John".

compositionYear.description: Year when the composition was composed.
